mapper.insert: insert into address_book (user_id, consignee, sex, phone_number, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, district_code, district_name, detail_address, label, is_default, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{userId}, #{consignee}, #{sex}, #{phoneNumber}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{detailAddress}, #{label}, #{isDefault}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
